docs.abstract: Outgoing Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr, who helped soothe tensions in Ferguson, Mo, after fatal police shooting of unarmed black teenager Michael Brown, now has limited options to calm unrest after grand jury's decision not to indict white police officer Darren Wilson.

headline.main: As Protests Take a Turn, Holder Finds It Harder to Ease Racial Tensions
